story_30_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the official
award ceremony of the Pokémon Masters League.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Congratulations to you and your team for winning
the championship!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You formed friendships with many other sync pairs,
strengthened your bonds together, and created the
ultimate team!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
The five PML badges you collected during the
tournament represent five key values:
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: tranquility, freedom, patience, harmony, and pride.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
A peaceful spirit, an independent mind...
The ability to persevere, to have faith in others
and bring people together... A strong will...
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
These are the five qualities that make a
worthy king.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In the royal family, this wisdom has been passed
down from generation to generation.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
And while these words may have been aimed at
me originally, I’m sure that through your victories,
you’ve come to understand their value as well.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: You’ve shown you have these royal qualities—
story_30_07000/2401_1001_1100_10:
as Pasio’s best sync pair and as the leader of
our very first champion team!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I hope you continue to provide us all with
awe-inspiring Pokémon battles throughout Pasio!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Congratulations on your victory at the PML,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_2000_10: These insipid, ceremonial affairs make me sick!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Why should I stand here doling out soapy
commendations I don’t even believe!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_2400_10:
He must have tried so hard to hold it together...
Just didn’t quite make it to the end.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_2500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll have you know
that all my plans are in shambles because of you!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Yesterday, my father called me to say that my
coronation has been officially postponed!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_2700_10:
The entire succession is ruined all because you
got lucky during our match! What do you have
to say for yourself?!
story_30_07000/2401_0301_2800_10: I don’t know what to say...
story_30_07000/2401_0401_2900_10: Ugh! I don’t want to hear your excuses!
story_30_07000/2401_0402_3100_10:
Don’t apologize to me. Sorry’s not going to
change anything!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Jeez... He’s upset and he’s taking it all out on
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I guess I wouldn’t put it past him, but this really
isn’t the time or place...
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3400_10:
But I won’t let it end like this! I’m going to succeed
that throne if it’s the last thing I do!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3600_10:
I’m announcing the SECOND Pokémon Masters
League tournament!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3700_10: What?! But the first one just ended!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Is this the huge announcement Rachel was
talking about?!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Heh! As the founder of this tournament, I have the
power to hold it whenever I please!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_4000_10:
And this time, I’m going to be champion! I’ll prove
that I’m worthy of sitting on that throne. Isn’t that
right, Hoopa!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_4100_10: Lear, I see where you’re coming from, but...
story_30_07000/2401_1001_4200_10:
“But” what? I thought that you of all people would
be on board with this!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_4300_10:
After all, you’ll get the chance to battle face-to-
face with [Name:PlayerNickname ] this time!
story_30_07000/2401_0301_4600_10: I’d love to battle you again!
story_30_07000/2401_0401_4800_10:
You know, I’ve been watching you grow as a
Trainer for a while now...
story_30_07000/2401_0401_4900_10:
And I’ve gotta admit, I have been wanting to test
my strength against you in an all-out battle!
story_30_07000/2401_0302_5000_10: I wanna battle you all this time!
story_30_07000/2401_0402_5200_10:
It goes without saying that you’ve become a
rock-solid sync pair...
story_30_07000/2401_0402_5300_10:
Given the chance, I’d like to battle you, too—
as a rival I’ve grown stronger beside!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_5500_10:
I know you’re excited for this, but don’t count your
Togepi before they hatch.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_5600_10:
Who’s to say my team won’t jump in and beat
[Name:PlayerNickname ] first!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_5700_10:
Exactly! Today’s teammates are tomorrow’s rivals!
It’s the way sync pairs on Pasio were always
meant to be!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_5800_10:
If you want to keep your champion title, you’re
going to have to find new sync pairs to team
up with!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_5900_10:
And then my team will crush every last one
of you!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6000_10:
Even with his coronation postponed, Master Lear
looks, like, sooo excited right now!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6100_10:
Between you and me, when the king spoke to
him about his succession yesterday...
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6200_10: he also told him, “You battled well.”
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6300_10: Oooooooh! Bet that knocked his socks off, huh!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6400_10:
Hopefully this’ll start to mend that rift that formed
between them when the queen passed away.
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6500_10:
I’m sure it’ll all work out, now that the young
master has learned how important it is to connect
with others...
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6700_10:
I’ll be announcing the start of the second PML
tournament as soon as preparations are complete!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6800_10:
And that’s not all—Pasio will soon be host to a
number of other exciting activities as well!
story_30_07000/2401_1001_6900_10:
Let all of us—people and Pokémon—continue to
strengthen the bonds that connect us!
